E-Mail Messages
Date: Friday, 2/7/1990
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
RF Wilburn Schaefer
in return for
LF Henry Dickison, SP Mike Militello.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Boston (FBA) GM



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1990
Subject: Aron Fong learns new position
Aron Fong has made noteable progress
learning his new position, First Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Emilio Colon
Dear Sir,
Emilio Colon isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .171, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1990
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Joey Almonte



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1990
Subject: Status of Tomas Sarachaga
Dear Sir,
Tomas Sarachaga shouldn't play at AA !
He has an AVG of .249 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Henry Dickison



Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Gary Brouillette learns new position
Gary Brouillette has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 6/23/1990
Subject: Progress of Colby Zamora
Dear Sir,
Colby Zamora is doing pretty good at AA !
He has an ERA of 3.97, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Friday, 7/4/1990

Dear Sir,
